amendment.description: Amendment prohibited funds in the bill from being used for any projects named after a sitting Member of Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for a project or program named for an individual then serving as a Member, Delegate, Resident Commissioner, or Senator of the United States Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCaul (TX) amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 329 - 86 (Roll no. 559).
